narrative.title: 51St Highland Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: British Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Veteran assault infantry division specialized in breakthrough operations and pursuit
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain, wadis, and mountainous terrain (Mareth Line position). Mixed firm and muddy ground due to winter rains.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Night assault operations (proven at El Alamein)
Highland fighting spirit and esprit de corps

environment.terrain_type: Coastal plain, wadis, and mountainous terrain (Mareth Line position). Mixed firm and muddy ground due to winter rains.
